title: Long-term Systemic Effects of Metabolic Bariatric Surgery: A Multidisciplinary Perspective

Author(s): Mohammad Reza Rajabi, Masoud Rezaei, Arash abdollahi, Zahra Gholi, Somayyeh Mokhber, Gholamreza Mohammadi-Farsani, Danial Abdoli, Seyed Davood Mousavi, Helen Amini, Maryam Ghandchi
